languages.text: "Сообщение, полученное от Эмелины, неполное и рваное — понять его в деталях невозможно. Единственное, что очевидно — аколит Инквизиции просит меня немедленно прибыть на отдаленную планету Фтон IV. В сообщении угадывается о военной поддержке или помощи с эвакуацией — что бы ни было причиной для подобного запроса, Эмелина не стала бы требовать подобного без серьезной на то причины".

"Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."
languages.original_text: "Сообщение, полученное от Эмелины, неполное и рваное — понять его в деталях невозможно. Единственное, что очевидно — аколит Инквизиции просит меня немедленно прибыть на отдаленную планету Фтон IV. В сообщении угадывается о военной поддержке или помощи с эвакуацией — что бы ни было причиной для подобного запроса, Эмелина не стала бы требовать подобного без серьезной на то причины".

In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

languages.text: “艾米莉娜的信息并不完整，内容也遭到了扭曲，没法清楚了解她的意图。我现在唯一能确定的事情，就是她，审判庭的侍仆，要求我立刻前往一颗名为‘菲顿四号星’的偏远行星。在她的信息中，她似乎是在请求军事支援，或是请求我们协助撤离。虽然不知道具体出于什么原因，但若非绝对必要的话，艾米莉娜是不会提出这种请求的。”
languages.original_text: "Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: “艾米莉娜的信息并不完整，内容也遭到了扭曲，没法清楚了解她的意图。我现在唯一能确定的事情，就是她，审判庭的侍仆，要求我立刻前往一颗名为‘菲顿四号星’的偏远行星。在她的信息中，她似乎是在请求军事支援，或是请求我们协助撤离。虽然不知道具体出于什么原因，但若非绝对必要的话，艾米莉娜是不会提出这种请求的。”

languages.text: «El mensaje de Emelina está incompleto y distorsionado, por lo que no hay forma de comprender todas sus palabras. Lo único que sabemos con seguridad es que una acólita de la Inquisición me está pidiendo que viaje de inmediato a Phton IV, un planeta remoto. En su mensaje, parece solicitar o apoyo militar o ayuda con una evacuación, pero, aunque no sepa qué ha provocado esta solicitud, puedo asegurarle que Emelina jamás pediría algo así de no ser absolutamente necesario».
languages.original_text: "Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: «El mensaje de Emelina está incompleto y distorsionado, por lo que no hay forma de comprender todas sus palabras. Lo único que sabemos con seguridad es que una acólita de la Inquisición me está pidiendo que viaje de inmediato a Phton IV, un planeta remoto. En su mensaje, parece solicitar o apoyo militar o ayuda con una evacuación, pero, aunque no sepa qué ha provocado esta solicitud, puedo asegurarle que Emelina jamás pediría algo así de no ser absolutamente necesario».

languages.text: 「エメリナさんのメッセージは不完全で乱れたものでした。すべての言葉をの意味を理解することは不可能です。我らが確かに把握している唯一のことは、異端審問庁のアコライトが我に、辺境の惑星プトン・IVにすぐに行くよう依頼しているということだけです。彼女のメッセージの中で、軍事支援もしくは避難の支援を要求しているようですが、この要求が何であれ、絶対に必要なものでない限り、エメリナさんが発することはなかったでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナさんのメッセージは不完全で乱れたものでした。すべての言葉をの意味を理解することは不可能です。我らが確かに把握している唯一のことは、異端審問庁のアコライトが我に、辺境の惑星プトン・IVにすぐに行くよう依頼しているということだけです。彼女のメッセージの中で、軍事支援もしくは避難の支援を要求しているようですが、この要求が何であれ、絶対に必要なものでない限り、エメリナさんが発することはなかったでしょう」

languages.text: « Le message d'Emelina est incomplet et brouillé, il est impossible de comprendre chacun de ses mots. La seule chose qui est certaine, c'est qu'une acolyte de l'Inquisition souhaite que je me rende immédiatement sur Phton-IV, une planète reculée. Dans son message, elle semble demander soit une aide militaire, soit une évacuation, mais quelle qu'en soit la cause, Emelina n'aurait pas formulé cette demande si elle n'était pas d'une importance capitale. »
languages.original_text: "Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: « Le message d'Emelina est incomplet et brouillé, il est impossible de comprendre chacun de ses mots. La seule chose qui est certaine, c'est qu'une acolyte de l'Inquisition souhaite que je me rende immédiatement sur Phton-IV, une planète reculée. Dans son message, elle semble demander soit une aide militaire, soit une évacuation, mais quelle qu'en soit la cause, Emelina n'aurait pas formulé cette demande si elle n'était pas d'une importance capitale. »

languages.text: "Emelinas Nachricht ist unvollständig und gestört – es ist unmöglich, ihren kompletten Sinn zu erfassen. Sicher ist nur, dass eine Akolythin der Inquisition mich bittet, sofort zu dem abgelegenen Planeten Phton IV aufzubrechen. Sie scheint in ihrer Nachricht entweder militärische Unterstützung oder Hilfe bei einer Evakuierung anzufordern, aber was immer dieser Bitte vorausging, Emelina würde niemals so handeln, wenn es nicht unbedingt erforderlich wäre."
languages.original_text: "Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Emelinas Nachricht ist unvollständig und gestört – es ist unmöglich, ihren kompletten Sinn zu erfassen. Sicher ist nur, dass eine Akolythin der Inquisition mich bittet, sofort zu dem abgelegenen Planeten Phton IV aufzubrechen. Sie scheint in ihrer Nachricht entweder militärische Unterstützung oder Hilfe bei einer Evakuierung anzufordern, aber was immer dieser Bitte vorausging, Emelina würde niemals so handeln, wenn es nicht unbedingt erforderlich wäre."

languages.text: "Emelina'nın mesajı yarım ve bozuktu, tüm sözcüklere anlam vermek imkânsız. Kesin olarak bildiğimiz tek şey, Engizisyon'un bir havarisinin benim derhâl ücra bir gezegen olan Phton IV'e gitmemi istiyor oluşu. Mesajında bir tahliye için yardım veya askerî destek talep ediyor gibi gözüküyor. Bu talebe zemin hazırlayan şey nedir bilmiyorum ama Emelina kesinlikle ihtiyaç duymasaydı böyle bir şey yapmazdı."
languages.original_text: "Emelina's message is incomplete and distorted — it is impossible to make sense of every word. The only thing we know for certain is that an acolyte of the Inquisition is asking me to go immediately to Phton IV, a remote planet. In her message, she seems to be requesting either military support or help with an evacuation, but whatever precipitated this request, Emelina would not make it if it weren't absolutely necessary."
